modelo.descripcion: Bra훾a I is the original world's first 'tear-drop' design and our most widely used paddle. The paddle is designed to facilitate application of power in the strokes. Recommended for strongest male athletes.

Bra훾a II is based on the Bra훾a I design, it has increased blade pitch (see diagram below), which provides a firmer catch and more effortless exit than Bra훾a I. Recommended for strongest male athletes.
